product_name: Outdoor Research Revel Rain Jacket - Men's
long_description: When the call of the trail lures you outside despite a rainy forecast, the men's Outdoor Research Revel Rain Jacket offers waterproof, breathable rain protection with light, comfortable stretch. Pertex' Shield 2.5-layer nylon keeps you dry and offers movement-mirroring stretch. Seams are fully sealed and zippers have a durable water repellent coating to resist weather. Front 2-way zipper features both an external and internal stormflap for excellent rain and wind protection. Double-sliding hem-to-bicep zippers offer wide-open ventilation, and jacket stuffs into the left-hand zippered pocket for storage. The Outdoor Research Revel Jacket for men seals out the elements with its adjustable cuffs and drawcord hem. 2 zippered hand pockets; zippered chest pocket; adjustable, storable hood.
short_description: When the call of the trail lures you outside despite a rainy forecast, the men's Outdoor Research Revel Rain Jacket offers waterproof, breathable rain protection with light, comfortable stretch.
